mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Concerns the letter to John Jay; must be sent by courier because Michel Guillaume St. John de Crévecoeur already left Paris; the letter must get to Havre before the packet [ship] sails; other letters still to be forwarded to Nantes.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: St. John de Crévecoeur, J. Hector, 1735-1813
Jay, John, 1745-1829
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1787 May 4, Marseilles, [France] to [William Short], n.p.
